mapper.select:
SELECT MSO.COMPANY_CD , MSO.DIVISION_CD , MSO.SHIP_TO_CD , MSO.SHIP_TO_NM , MSO.SO_NO , MSO.SO_SEQ , MSO.STORAGE_WAREHOUSE_CD AS SHIPPING_WAREHOUSE_CD , MSO.STORAGE_WAREHOUSE_NM AS SHIPPING_WAREHOUSE_NM , MSO.ITEM_ID , MSO.ITEM_NM , MSO.ITEM_SPEC , MSO.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MSO.COMPANY_CD, MSO.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MSO.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MSO.SO_UOM , MSO.SO_UOM_NM , MSO.SO_CONFIRM_DATE , MSO.ORDER_QTY , MSO.SHIPPING_QTY , MSO.CANCEL_QTY , (MSO.ORDER_QTY - MSO.CANCEL_QTY - MSO.DR_REQUEST_QTY ) AS REMAIN_QTY , MSO.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MSO.COMPANY_CD, MSO.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MSO.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MSO.UNIT_PRICE , MSO.EXCHANGE_RATE , MSO.AMOUNT , MSO.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MSO.CUSTOMER_ITEM_ID , MSO.SALES_ITEM_ID , MSO.SALES_ORDER_ID , MSO.SALES_ORDER_ID AS KEY_ID , MSO.DR_REQUEST_QTY AS SHIPPING_REQUEST_QTY , MSO.IO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_IO_TYPE_NAME(MSO.COMPANY_CD, MSO.DIVISION_CD, MSO.IO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS IO_TYPE_NM FROM MOM_SALES_ORDER_V MSO WHERE MSO.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MSO.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MSO.SHIP_TO_CD = #{shipToCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MSO.CURRENCY_CD = #{currencyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MSO.ORDER_QTY - MSO.DR_REQUEST_QTY - MSO.CANCEL_QTY > 0
AND UPPER(MSO.SO_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{soNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
ORDER BY MSO.SO_NO , MSO.SO_SEQ
